resources.string:
Gold Runner is a fun game, ideal for runners. The user collects coins from random locations on the map during shortest time and time as possible. The main activity displays distance covered, calories burnt and points collected. The user can see the best three scores along with date and time.
 
First release : May 15,2018 
Platform : Android Studio 
 
Developers: Chaitali Deore, Mohamad Yassin, Qaisar Mukhtar, Neelam Singla, Michal Szukala, Manoj Kumar Arya, Pradeep Agrawal, Yannick Ngabirano, Nisreen Alhmaedy.
